modName: Advanced First Aid Kit and Bandage
modShortDescription: This mod adds the advanced first aid Kit and Bandage. These are harder to craft but restore much more health than the regular healing items.
modDescription:
This mod adds the advanced [first aid](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-medical-supplies/) Kit and Bandage. These are harder to craft but restore much more health than the regular healing items. Also included is a recipe to make sewing kits.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18_quKV5NLI0cwrrukH0Nq7nDMm0LrYcE/view?usp=sharing)** from Google Drive  
**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/lm9ev8qhl0fe2tf/Advaned_First_Aid_Kit_And_Bandage.zip/file)** from MediaFire

**Credits:** [Zilox](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/zilox/)
